story: Meligy shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: GuruStop.NET » Hey, Readify is hiring all across Australia, from all over the world!
caption: gurustop.net
description: Readify, the great consulting company where I work now, is hiring for Senior Developer (Consultant) and Senior Consultant positions all across Australia, and sponsors work visa for accepted international applications. You can apply here:http://bit.ly/readify-openings.You don’t have to mention this p...

data.message: Developers / consultants are expected to work on front end and back end of course, but no dedicated designer roles. We specialize in Microsoft development consultancy.
